column1: s per the document marked P2, which constitutes the reference to arbitration, the
matter in dispute between the parties is as follows;
“whether any injustice was caused to the forty-five employees whose names are referred to
in the attached schedule and who had joined the Ceylon Steel Corporation prior to the year
1975  and  those  who  were  subsequently  absorbed  to  the  service  of  the  Ceylon  Heavy
Industries and Constructions Company Ltd in terms of the agreement entered into between
corporation and the said Company on 31/10/1996 in consequence of the  employment of
them on contract basis for a period of two years under the Company with less privileges
and if any injustice was caused to what relief each of the forty-five employees is entitled.”
